mapper.select: select u.name, u.uni_num, 'Computer-Software' as dept, t.team_name, t.team_id from user as u left outer join team as t on (u.team_id = t.team_id) where uni_num = #{uni_num}
mapper.update: update team set team_name = #{team_name} where team_id = #{team_id};
mapper.select: select uni_num, name from user order by uni_num limit 0, 5;
